name: GArduino
body:
### Welcome to GitHub Pages. GArduino is a smart greenhouse that allow you to control some value as Temperature, Air Humidity, Terrain Humidity ecc.. ###How it's made? GArduino is made up by Arduino.
Arduino is a programmable electoronic board made in Italy <3 and it's the heart of GArduino. ### How GArduino Comunicate? GArduino comunicate by Internet with the Ethernet Shield and UDP packet.
GArduino Controller allows you in addition to check the value, to Irrigate the greenhouse, switch on/off the Light or activate automatic managemet of the Light. ###Contacts Facebook:
E-mail: dispoto97@gmail.com
Web-Site: ##Support Open Source
